attributes.action: Fly the Union Flag above every public building within the United kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: In these dangerous times, where the threat of terrorism is on the rise. We need to send a message to those who wish us harm. That message is. We are British. We are united through the diversity of our multicultural society. We are united under a unifying British culture, where we all share British values & principles. Where our children in schools or our sick in hospitals, can look out & feel pride in their caring society & country. It's time to stand united, together. It's time we fly the flag.
attributes.background: Above every public building within the United Kingdom, let's show pride in our country by flying the Union Flag of our great nation. To instil a sense of collective pride & patriotism in our youth. For them to look up to & be proud to be British no matter who you are or the person you choose to be.
